description:
PostgreSQL Cluster monitoring dashboard.

Provides a top-level view of the entire cluster:
- Cluster health at-a-glance
- Instance list with drill-down
- Master history / failover tracking
- Replication topology and lag
- Read/Write split visibility
- Cluster-wide problems and resources

Click on an instance row to drill down to the instance-level dashboard.

panels.description: Cluster status. Shows DOWN if any instance in the cluster is down.
panels.title: Cluster status

panels.description: Total number of PostgreSQL instances in the cluster.
panels.title: Total instances

panels.description: Number of instances currently up and responding.
panels.title: Up instances

panels.description: Number of primary instances. Should be exactly 1 for a healthy cluster.
panels.title: Primary count

panels.description: Number of replica instances in the cluster.
panels.title: Replica count

panels.description: Maximum replication lag in seconds across all replicas.
panels.title: Max replication lag

panels.description: Lowest cache hit ratio across all instances.

targets.expr:
min by (job,cluster) (
  sum by (instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_hit{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
/
(
  sum by (instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_hit{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  +
  sum by (instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_read{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  + 1
)

)

panels.title: Worst cache hit ratio

panels.description: Highest connection utilization across all instances.

targets.expr:
max by (job,cluster) (
  sum by (instance) (pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
/
max by (instance) (pg_settings_max_connections{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})

)

panels.title: Worst connection utilization

panels.description: Total deadlocks detected across all instances in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total deadlocks

panels.description: All PostgreSQL instances in the cluster. Click a row to view instance details.

targets.expr:
sum by (job,cluster,instance) (
  (
  sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  /
  max by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_settings_max_connections{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
)

)

sum by (job,cluster,instance) (
  (
  sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_hit{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  /
  (
    sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_hit{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
    +
    sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_read{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  )
)

)

panels.title: Cluster Instances

panels.description: Timeline showing the role of each instance. Blue = Primary, Purple = Replica. Role changes indicate failover events.
panels.title: Primary Role History

panels.description: Detects role changes (failovers). Spikes indicate when an instance changed role.
panels.title: Failover Events

panels.description: Total queries running longer than threshold across all instances.
panels.title: Total long-running queries

panels.description: Total queries waiting for locks across all instances.
panels.title: Total blocked queries

panels.description: Total connections idle in transaction across all instances.
panels.title: Total idle in transaction

panels.description: Total WAL archive failures across all instances.
panels.title: Total WAL archive failures

panels.description: Highest lock utilization across all instances.

targets.expr:
max by (job,cluster) (
  sum by (instance) (pg_locks_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
/
(
  max by (instance) (pg_settings_max_locks_per_transaction{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  *
  max by (instance) (pg_settings_max_connections{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
)

)

panels.title: Worst lock utilization

panels.description: Total exporter scrape errors across all instances.
panels.title: Total exporter errors

panels.description: Replication lag in seconds per replica instance.
panels.title: Replication Lag by Instance

panels.description: WAL bytes pending per replication slot. High values indicate slow replicas.
panels.title: Replication Slot Lag

panels.description: Current WAL LSN position on the primary. Shows total WAL written over time.
panels.title: WAL Position

panels.description: Transactions per second per instance. Compare workload distribution.
panels.title: TPS by Instance

panels.description: Queries per second per instance. Requires pg_stat_statements extension.
panels.title: QPS by Instance

panels.description: Write operations (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE) from the primary instance only.
panels.title: Write Operations (Primary)

panels.description: Rows fetched per second per instance. Shows read distribution across primary and replicas.
panels.title: Read Operations by Instance

panels.description: Ratio of read operations to write operations cluster-wide.
panels.title: Read/Write Ratio

panels.description: Total connections across all instances vs total max connections.
panels.title: Total Connections

panels.description: Cache hit ratio per instance over time.

targets.expr:
sum by (job,cluster,instance) (
  (
  sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_hit{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  /
  (
    sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_hit{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
    +
    sum by (job,cluster,instance, instance) (pg_stat_database_blks_read{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster"})
  )
)

)

panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio by Instance

panels.description: Total size of all databases on the primary.
panels.title: Total database size

panels.description: Current WAL LSN position on the primary. Shows total WAL written over time.
panels.title: WAL Position

title: PostgreSQL Cluster Overview
